post.body: I am enjoying the thought of succulents in your office. They might do better in an air conditioned environment :D
my venus flytrap is doing ok, the traps are not as wide open as they were when I originally bought them, but it maybe bcuz of the half shade
I'm getting addicted to goolai, hearty salad with different dressings everyday. But a bit expensive.
Finished installing second router! Wifi reaches the mommy's cr and the dinning area! Patting my back. :D
Gonna buy a router later to extend our wifi at home.
I have 2 wedding invitations saturday and sunday... goodbye weekend. The saturday one is in TAGAYTAY! That's what you get for socializing!
I brought Max here with me in my room.
Back in Manila. Max was so happy he ran around the house. I left my cactus encyclopedia in Fern Tree Gully.
Thanks Grant and Ditsi for the advance Christmas gift!!! "The complete encyclopedia of Cacti by Rudolf subik and Libor Kunte"
We've got Hail! They're big! More than 2 cm. Goodthing Grant picked us up from the station. We saved some of the hail stones in the freezer.
The lamb for dinner was excellent! Compliments to the chef! The smell of cooked lamb with the fresh suburb air is just... perfect!
Busy day, jogged with atsi, Frisbee with grant, mowed lawn, took a walk with grant and gage, shopped safe way with mommy, washed dishes.
Feasting at Melbourne! Gage doesn't like his food too much though :P
We have arrived at Melbourne. Victoria Market is the place to look for succulents!
I'm off to Melbourne, maybe I'll buy some air plants and smuggle them back to manila. Gonna buy a Tillandsia bulbosa.
I wish my Gymnocalycium seeds would sprout already. What's taking so long? Either my Haworthia or Aloe is taking it's time to sprout. :(
Finally Dad is back! Now I can borrow his camera to get the macro pics of my seedlings! A camera for macro shots is vital in gardening hehe
Wow can't wait to see Gage walk. He'll probably be scared of us. But he'll come around :D
5 seedlings have sprouted!
Mom Dad flew to Macau. And this morning, a seedling has sprouted! Yey!
One weekend to buy all Christmas gifts... :(
Thanks atsi for the pull-up bar. A very high quality piece of equipment, no wonder it's called "perfect pull-up"!
I've watched too many shows, time to rest.
Not gonna attempt chin-ups cuz my brother sez I won't be able to do it also bcuz his opinion matters so much to me.
Catching up on shows.
Saku's bowling group Christmas party last night at gloria maris. The raffle ended at around 11pm. Atsi fell asleep on her seat.
http://www.zuzafun.com/winter-on-earth <- look at the cat with the hat! cute!
I drank a Margarita at the party last night primarily because it contained Agave tequila. Those rose like succulents that I have are Agaves.
